quote_first: The only two items that stood out on the whole list for Cork were two calls placed from the home of Wilfred Lipinksi, mayor of Aurora, one at
quote_last: and another at 10:41 P.M. If Lipinski had teenagers who knew about the party at Valhalla, the calls would not have been odd, but all the Lipinski children were long ago grown and gone, and so Cork wondered.
title: Blood Hollow
author: William Kent Krueger

quote_first: Second to last, the inset clock blinks from
quote_last: to 21:58. Napier’s eyes sink, newborn sunshine slants through ancient oaks and on a lost river. Look, Joe, herons
title: Cloud Atlas
author: David Mitchell

quote_first: The waiting man pulled out a handsome watch, the lids of it set with small diamonds. “
title: The Four Million
author: O. Henry
